description: This file contains client-side JavaScript code for a sign-in page, handling input validation, UI interactions, and logging for social sign-in buttons.
external_files: None explicitly referenced by filename, but uses DOM elements with specific IDs

methods.name: noopNavigate
methods.description: Prevents default link behavior and logs click events for navigation links.

methods.name: isValidEmail
methods.description: Validates email format using a regex pattern.

methods.name: isValidPassword
methods.description: Checks if password is a string with at least 6 characters.

methods.name: updateButtonState
methods.description: Enables or disables the sign-in button based on input validation.

methods.name: bindFocusStyles
methods.description: Adds focus and blur event listeners to input fields to toggle focus styles.
